programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: George Collins, a meek young man who loves to write, moves west for adventure. However, he is soon fired as a trail cook and beaten up by trailhands. Lucas takes George under his wing to help him discover his true qualities and inner strength.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Mark overhears men plotting to rob the North Fork Bank while at a surveying camp and tells Lucas about what he heard. When Lucas questions his story, Mark runs away from home. Lucas later learns Mark was telling the truth and helps capture the men.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A famous old frontiersman, with a reputation as the best rifleman around, challenges Luke to see who's really the best with a rifle.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A mail-order husband arrives in North Fork, and finds not only a bride, but also harassment from two local troublemakers.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: Cheyenne returns the body of war hero Cole Prescott to his hometown of White River for a proper burial. However, when Cheyenne arrives, instead of a warm welcome, the townspeople greet him with hate towards the dead man.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: Cheyenne returns to his hometown as Sheriff Bodie. He is seeking a murderer in a town filled with corruption. Being home brings back many memories, including an old feud and a man who organized a lynching when he was a child.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: The guys saddle up to rope in a renegade heifer before she tears up a neighbor's field. Booger creates a birthday to remember for his 85-year-old grandma, including her first ride in a convertible, a photo shoot and a huge surprise party with a special guest. Cody goes on a personal publicity tour to promote the opening of their pop-up restaurant. On the eve of their big opening, the neglected details could turn the cowboys' restaurant dream into a nightmare. Bubba forgets a key ingredient, Cody's efforts bring in an unexpected number of hungry customers, and they run out of their signature steak. It's a night to make the guys wonder if they'd be better off just sticking to The Cowboy Way of life they love.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: It's a rope-swinging episode of The Cowboy Way! After their restaurant venture, each of the cowboys takes some quality time to reconnect with family and discuss their futures. Cody decides to make the ranch high-tech, but will it be a success or will he get his wires crossed? Bubba plays locksmith for Booger's truck. A missing cow gets stuck in the woods. The guys use Booger's annual horse clinic as a way to give back to the community. And get ready for matchmaking the cowboy way! When the boys set up a mixer for bachelors Frankie and Hodge, speed-dating turns into a literal horse race to win the ladies' affections.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Mexican bandits attack Lucas and Mark for crossing their desert without paying. The group steals their horses, kidnaps Mark, and leaves Lucas to die in the desert. Lucas gets free and trails the banditos to a small village.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Against Lucas' wishes, Mark gets a job at the livery stable in town. Lucas has doubts that Mark can both work and get his chores done on time. Mark finds himself in trouble when he takes a shortcut on an errand and meets a dangerous bank robber.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: A young Jim Bridger helps a Shoshone woman escape the clutches of her abusive husband. As Bridger squares off against the frontier ruffian and his henchmen, he soon realizes that the woman he is helping is none other than the legendary Sacajawea.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: When a young girl is bitten by a rattlesnake, mountain man Jim Bridger finds himself in a race against time to save her arm and keep her alive as he desperately searches the wilderness for a medicinal plant that once saved the life of his friend.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.sub-title: Law Comes to No Man's Land
programme.desc: Marshal Chris Madsen helps newly appointed judge John Buford bring law and order to Oklahoma's Panhandle in an area known as No Man's Land. After escorting a wagon train of prisoners to Beaver City, they set up their first courthouse inside a saloon.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: When bandits rob a train and gun down a pursuing marshal, they spark one of the largest manhunts in California history. After taking shelter behind the crumbling walls of Stone Corral, they make their final stand against a hail of gunfire.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: Heading west as a young adventurer, greenhorn Jim Baker quickly develops a reputation as a skilled marksman and mountain man. When a party of trappers is surrounded and attacked by Cheyenne and Arapaho warriors, Baker proves that he is also a leader.

programme.title: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown
programme.desc: The twelve remaining cowboys saddle up for another immunity challenge - tournament-style pasture roping. The contestant who ropes and tie-downs a steer the fastest won't be on the chopping block during the next elimination. Guest judge, eight-time PRCA Champion Fred Whitfield, joins Trace and the other judges to help narrow down the immunity buckle winner. The cowboys compete in a grueling relay race for the elimination challenge that tests their horsemanship and showcases various riding skills. The relay race takes its toll on a contestant's horse, slowing down the blue team. After an avoidable mistake, the green team suspects one of their own of sabotage. Trace ups the ante, sending two cowboys home and leaving the rest in shock.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: Jimmy joins the Kid in infiltrating the Hawk's gang. Meanwhile, as the Civil War nears, Sweetwater becomes an embattled town as townspeople must take up arms against the renegades.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: George Collins, a meek young man who loves to write, moves west for adventure. However, he is soon fired as a trail cook and beaten up by trailhands. Lucas takes George under his wing to help him discover his true qualities and inner strength.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Mark overhears men plotting to rob the North Fork Bank while at a surveying camp and tells Lucas about what he heard. When Lucas questions his story, Mark runs away from home. Lucas later learns Mark was telling the truth and helps capture the men.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A famous old frontiersman, with a reputation as the best rifleman around, challenges Luke to see who's really the best with a rifle.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A mail-order husband arrives in North Fork, and finds not only a bride, but also harassment from two local troublemakers.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: Cheyenne returns the body of war hero Cole Prescott to his hometown of White River for a proper burial. However, when Cheyenne arrives, instead of a warm welcome, the townspeople greet him with hate towards the dead man.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: Cheyenne returns to his hometown as Sheriff Bodie. He is seeking a murderer in a town filled with corruption. Being home brings back many memories, including an old feud and a man who organized a lynching when he was a child.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: The guys are back in the saddle on The Cowboy Way! Their dreams of making it big have finally arrived with a million-dollar business opportunity, but only if they can come up with half the cash. While the cowboys struggle with how to raise the money, Bubba is torn if he should ask his father-in-law for help. Booger teaches Matthew to be a real cowboy and gives him his first pony! But when Jaclyn misses this big milestone, she questions if her demanding job is keeping her from her family. And finally, Cody's mission to teach kids about the importance of ranching leads him to take on the Cattlemen's Association. How far will he go to make his point?

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: It's back to basics on The Cowboy Way as the guys work to rotate cattle off a lightning-struck field to fresh grass, but the routine wrangle suddenly heads south as the herd scatters, jumping and taking down part of a fence. Kaley wonders about finances and if she should find work, while Bubba invests in a starter herd for daughter Andie's Cowgirl College Fund. Jaclyn rushes to prepare for Matthew's 4th birthday party and anxiously waits for news after a job interview. Booger's parents have a special birthday surprise for Matthew. As the Cattlemen's Association Ambassador, Cody gets a call from a local farmer and meets their autistic son Tristan. Misty gives Cody an idea how to share the cowboy way lifestyle with this special boy.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas stands guard at the North Fork Bank when $50,000 arrives in a specially designed stagecoach strongbox. Two gunmem who plan to ambush and rob the stage take Milly and Mark hostage in the general store, which doubles as their headquarters.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Two prison wagon drivers stop at the McCain Ranch looking for whiskey. Lucas refuses since they are taking a murderer named Rudy Croft to be hanged in Yuma. Later, Croft escapes and the guards take Lucas as their prisoner.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: When Jim Bridger's second-in-command begins enforcing camp discipline with brutal violence, one trapper pushes back, and a showdown seems inevitable. Can Bridger intervene before the situation turns from mutual hostility into cold-blooded murder?

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: Haunted by the memory of leaving a man to die, mountain man Jim Bridger is determined not to repeat the mistake. When his trapping party runs out of water while crossing a barren desert, Bridger struggles desperately to keep his companions alive.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: Once a feared gunfighter and sheriff, the legendary Bat Masterson is now working as a newspaperman. He heads west again to uncover the real story of Pearl Hart, the first woman to rob a stagecoach in the Old West. Masterson tracks down Pearl's partner-in-crime, Joe Boot, who shares every daring and surprising detail from his wild days with the notorious Bandit Queen. In a time when outlaws and gunslingers captured the fascination of the American public, Pearl Hart was living proof that in the Wild West a woman could be just as infamous as a man.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: Bat Masterson, legendary gunfighter and sheriff, is now working as a newspaperman. He heads west again to uncover the real story behind the most brazen bank robbery of the Old West. Masterson tracks down the sole survivor of the Dalton Gang, who relives the horrible day when they attempted to rob two banks at the same time. The youngest of the Dalton brothers, Emmett Dalton describes how the gang was gunned down as they tried to make their getaway. Despite numerous gunshot wounds, Emmett lived to serve his time in prison and renounce his life of crime.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.sub-title: Lucien Maxwell: Legend of New Mexico
programme.desc: Having explored the frontier with his good friend Kit Carson, Lucien Maxwell is eager to settle down with his family. But before he can establish a ranching empire in New Mexico, Maxwell must first survive a deadly clash with the Jicarilla Apache.

programme.title: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown
programme.desc: Now down to ten cowboys, the competition continues with an all-new immunity challenge that focuses on a whole different aspect of cowboyin' - business acumen. The contestants must prove they know the cattle market by estimating the value of various livestock at auction. Trace asks the contestants to continue to train the colts from the last elimination challenge, but they struggle to develop a plan that will work for everyone. The elimination challenge tests the contestants' team strategy, roping, and speed. Each team has forty-five minutes to collect fifteen gold ear tags from mixed herds in two different pastures. Frustrations build when the green team has trouble with the pens, and a cow escapes during the blue team's run. As the competition intensifies, one cowboy tries to get rid of his biggest competition. Unimpressed by how the teams handled the challenge, Trace shakes things up by sending two cowboys home.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: A gunman impersonating Jimmy as Wild Bill Hickok, robs banks in the territory. Jimmy goes undercover to find out who is framing him. To catch the gunman in the act, the riders position themselves at the next bank that he plans to rob.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Aaron Wingate lost his wife and son in a river boat fire years ago. The boy was never found. Wingate hires two private detectives who come to North Fork and decide that Mark will fit the bill. Lucas must fight for custody.
